title: The County Hotel Bath in UK Warns the Public about Fake Hotel Reservation Sites and How to Avoid Them
text:
Reservation is very important to travelers abroad as this could keep them from the hassle of looking on foot for the best hotels to stay in while on a trip. For this reason, many hotels, motels, apartments and other dwellings that offer permanent shelter to travelers and tourist see to it that they have a live website where prospects could reach them. But recently, as tourist starts to flocks hotel reservation websites, many have ended up getting a reservation from fake hotels which have imposed great threat to many travelers who are looking for reservations online. Today, the public is now wondering whether it is still safe to book reservations online or just go back to the previous way of searching the foreign city for an affordable hotel stay.
Hotels Bath has seen this coming as many tourists are getting eager to travel a lot with their family. Because their money is budgeted, they are forced to look for cheaper deals without identifying the legitimacy of the hotel. Being one of the luxury hotels in Bath UK, Hotels in Bath see to it that their room rates will not compromise the needs of the tourists traveling in Bath, UK. Moreover, their website is easy to access providing only true information about the places that people can visit in Bath, UK, and other nearby counties. And when it comes to online reservations, tourists will be rest assured that they are dealing with the legitimate hotel as Hotels in Bath are duly registered and licensed in England.
However, though there are numerous registered hotels around the world, there are still some who operates illegally by setting up fake websites for hotel reservation with blinding cheap offers to lure tourists and travelers. According to American Hotel and Lodging Association, since most people go online to book reservation and this habit have contributed to the 480 online hotel bookings per minute – it had opened another opportunity for crooks to scam people through hotel reservation. But there are ways to avoid getting deceived by illicit vendors, such as;
• Checking the search results for direct transactions with the hotel
• Look for the signs that a website visitor might be in a third-party site such as another company logo
• Compare the hotel phone number listed on the site with other search results
• Look out for fake contact info where most starts with a personal looking numbers
• Double check the URL of the website because scammers tend to copy it and just add a few characters or makes the brand name as its subdomain.
• Make sure that people are using secure connection especially on time when personal information is being transmitted where the web address starts with HTTPS and has a lock icon included.
Consequently, being scammed by these illicit vendors can be prevented if people will be keen and observant with the websites they are visiting. This is part of their responsibility in choosing the best hotel reservation , because just like the old maxim - no person will cheat another if they don’t permit them to do so.
